summary:
This is a USMC KA-BAR styled dagger for Skyrim.
Obviously not lore friendly.
United States of Skyrim?
or..United States of Tamriel..?

Either way

Detailed mesh, detailed texture.
Used a couple different references, including images from Google and my own KA-BAR knife.
descriptionHtml:
This is a USMC KA-BAR styled dagger for Skyrim.
Obviously not lore friendly.
United States of Skyrim?
or..United States of Tamriel..?

Either way

Detailed mesh, detailed texture.
Used a couple different references, including images from Google and my own KA-BAR knife.

The KA-BAR's item number is "410012ce"
Stats of the KA-BAR are slightly better than an ebony dagger.
Because of the colour I decided on it being "ebony" in-game. (ebony ingot used to sharpen it)

Location: Stabbed into a table at the blacksmith's area in Solitude.

Go find it and liberate us some dragons or something!




MUR'CA-RIM!
*shouts* MUHR, RI-KAH!
author: Kolton Burke
